content: on the hook 2 continue with one loop on the hook insert your hook under the lower part pointed with an arrow lower part and yarn over through both loops on your hook note one loop should always stay on the hook 3 insert your hook under the top loop pointed with an arrow and yo through both loops on the hook at the beginning it might looks a bit messy 4 repeat step 3 going under the top loop and yo after a couple of rounds the pattern becomes more visible follow the pattern to achieve your desired length attaching the strap pull the ends of the strap to the inside of the bag and knot to secure 3rd row down from the bag opening as shown by the red dots congratulations and thank you thank you for trying out this pattern if you have any troubles or suggestions of how i can improve it don t hesitate to dm me 5
